CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​CodeDB.​EventAccessor
public
CodeClear.​NaturalDocs.​Engine.​CodeDB.​EventAccessor

A variation of Accessor that is passed along with change events.  This is necessary because the code handling the events may need to query the database for more information, and this exposes only the small subset of functions that should be allowed then.

Functions
EventAccessor
internal EventAccessor (
Accessor newAccessor
)
GetFileIDsThatDefineClassID
public NumberSet GetFileIDsThatDefineClassID (
int classID
)

Returns the file IDs that contain topics which define the class ID.

GetInfoOnClassParents
public void GetInfoOnClassParents (
int classID,
out NumberSet parentClassIDs,
out NumberSet parentClassFileIDs
)

Looks up the parents of the passed class ID and returns their class IDs and all the file IDs that define them.

GetInfoOnLinksThatResolveToTopicID
public void GetInfoOnLinksThatResolveToTopicID (
int topicID,
out IDObjects.NumberSet fileIDs,
out IDObjects.NumberSet classIDs
)

Returns aggregate information on all links that resolve to the passed topic ID.

Parameters
topicID
int

The topic ID to look up links for.

fileIDs
out IDObjects.NumberSet

The file IDs of all the links.  Will be null if none.

classIDs
out IDObjects.NumberSet

The class IDs of all the links.  Will be null if none.

GetInfoOnLinksToTopicsWithNDLinkInSummary
public void GetInfoOnLinksToTopicsWithNDLinkInSummary (
Link link,
out IDObjects.NumberSet fileIDs,
out IDObjects.NumberSet classIDs
)

What the hell?  Okay, check this out: First it finds the topics which have the passed Natural Docs link in their summaries.  Then it returns aggregate information on all links that resolve to any of those topics.  This is needed for keeping tooltips accurate with differential building.  It makes sense, trust me.

Parameters
link
Link

The link to look up.  It must be a Natural Docs link.

fileIDs
out IDObjects.NumberSet

The file IDs of all the links that resolve to the topics that have the link in the summary.  Will be null if none.

classIDs
out IDObjects.NumberSet

The class IDs of all the links that resolve to the topics that have the link in the summary.  Will be null if none.

Variables
accessor
protected Accessor accessor

A reference to the main Accessor this object uses.
